name: Post a Job or Contract
description: Members of the public may post quests, contracts, or work requests for guild members to review and accept.

name: Request Skilled Labor
description: Hire vetted guild members for a specific task or short-term project.

name: Training & Skill Development
description: Receive formal instruction in specialized skills or techniques offered by certified guild members.

name: Repair Services
description: Get weapons, armor, tools, instruments, or gear repaired by qualified guild artisans.

name: Message Delivery
description: Send sealed letters or small parcels through the guild's trusted courier system.

name: Appraisal Services
description: Have an item, artifact, or document evaluated for value, authenticity, or magical properties.

name: Room & Board
description: Secure a basic room or dormitory lodging, typically for members or approved affiliates.

name: Public Noticeboard Access
description: Post or review notices, events, warnings, or job postings on the guild’s bulletin board.

name: Legal Arbitration
description: Request neutral arbitration for disputes involving guild members, contracts, or property.

name: Guild Membership Inquiry
description: Begin the process of applying for full or associate guild membership, or request an evaluation.
